title: Tata Motors total domestic sales rise to 90,822 units in March
description: Tata Motors reported a 2% increase in total domestic wholesales in March, reaching 90,822 units. Passenger vehicle sales surged by 14%, with commercial vehicle dispatches declining by 10%. For the fiscal year ending March 31, 2024, total domestic wholesales rose by 2%, marking the third consecutive year of record sales.
